attributes.action: Freeze payments on council tax until 6 months after the end of the epidemic
attributes.additional_details: For people that are self employed and under low income as well as the many people who are short during this and have no work.
attributes.background: Government to suspend council tax until the end of the Epidemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
